Question ID 430 – Definition of Gender
Release date
November 2024
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 215 of 278
ESRS Implementation Q&A Platform – Compilation of Explanations January – November 2024
Question asked
Many datapoints in the S1 have to be broken down by gender. Which definition of ‘gender’ is used
in the ESRS? Is it only the female-male categories or should answers contain a third, ‘diverse’
